ModMetaData.name: Automatic Bed Reassigment Forked
ModMetaData.description: This mod automatically reassigns pawns' beds when: pawns are sharing beds with (non-polyamorous) non-partners pawns are separated from their partners (or the partner they love the most if polyamorous) pawns are suffering a mood penalty from a bedroom-specific trait (jealous, greedy, ascetic) there are empty beds with better stats for the pawn (room impressiveness, rest effectiveness, comfort) NOTE: These conditions can be toggled within mod options.
ModMetaData.author: Original: pointfeev, forked by: Burrito Jambon
